content: Does anyone have interest/plans to bring a bulk-data-import implementation to the September connectathon? We're working on one using the new PnP spec, and we'd like to test it against other implementations.

We are currently using bundles in order to import practitioner and other resources... we're getting performance issues and it has come in mind if this is the best approach in order to do that. Is there any other alternative?
@Jordi Cabré You already raised this here: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179166-implementers/topic/bulk.20import and this thread is specific to the Sept. 21 Bulk import connectathon.
